content: @StPaulTim I believe OBS is a fairly popular video recording option: https://obsproject.com/ It's free and open-source, and works on Windows, Mac & Linux.
@BWPanda - I tested the Mac version of OBS once and I expect that you are right, it will probably be the first thing I try. Thanks for the reminder. I hope to give it a try sometime very soon.

Not sure how far you went with this but I've been using OBS for a good few years for personal live streaming to Facebook (every Sunday for 3 years) and professionally in a stadium and know it pretty well. If you need any help just holla.
